product_name: Columbia Fast Trek Fleece Vest - Women's Plus Sizes - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A classic style, the women's plus-size Columbia Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Vest stretches and keeps you warm as you hike or walk, and layers under a rain shell for cozy comfort on dreary days. 100% polyester microfleece offers 4-way stretch for freedom of movement. Zippered hand pockets secure small items. Full-zip front allows easy on/off and quick venting; high collar protects your neck in chilly weather. The women's plus-size Columbia Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Vest features flattering contoured shaping and distinctive yoke seams. Closeout.
short_description: A classic style, the women's plus-size Columbia Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Vest stretches and keeps you warm as you hike or walk, and layers under a rain shell for cozy comfort on dreary days.
